name: Spaceboy - Kintsugi
description:
The third and final part of the Spaceboy trilogy takes a glimpse of what took place in the final scene of Love and War.

When persistence to reach in ends up with a broken heart, the tide of battle may turn one into the very thing that he/she tries to save the other from becoming: a monster. Spaceboy is all of us who went through the loss of ambition to go on when the reason has forsaken our purpose. 

Spaceboy - Kintsugi symbolizes the healing process similar to the Japanese art of "golden repair" - a process of piecing broken pottery back together by mending the areas of breakage as part of its history rather than hiding the cracks.
